00013 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00014 // Resource cache for textures, fonts, meshs, and effects.  
00015 // Use DXUTGetGlobalResourceCache() to access the global cache
00016 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00017 
00018 enum DXUTCACHE_SOURCELOCATION
00019 {
00020     DXUTCACHE_LOCATION_FILE,
00021     DXUTCACHE_LOCATION_RESOURCE
00022 };
00023 
00024 struct DXUTCache_Texture
00025 {
00026     DXUTCACHE_SOURCELOCATION Location;
00027     WCHAR   wszSource[MAX_PATH];
00028     HMODULE hSrcModule;
00029     UINT Width;
00030     UINT Height;
00031     UINT Depth;
00032     UINT MipLevels;
00033     UINT MiscFlags;
00034     union
00035     {
00036         DWORD Usage9;
00037         D3D10_USAGE Usage10;
00038     };
00039     union
00040     {
00041         D3DFORMAT Format9;
00042         DXGI_FORMAT Format10;
00043     };
00044     union
00045     {
00046         D3DPOOL Pool9;
00047         UINT CpuAccessFlags;
00048     };
00049     union
00050     {
00051         D3DRESOURCETYPE Type9;
00052         UINT BindFlags;
00053     };
00054     IDirect3DBaseTexture9* pTexture9;
00055     ID3D10ShaderResourceView* pSRV10;
00056 
00057             DXUTCache_Texture()
00058             {
00059                 pTexture9 = NULL;
00060                 pSRV10 = NULL;
00061             }
00062 };

00286 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00287 // Simple helper stack class
00288 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00289 template <class T> class CDXUTStack
00290 {
00291 private:
00292     UINT m_MemorySize;
00293     UINT m_NumElements;
00294     T* m_pData;
00295 
00296     bool    EnsureStackSize( UINT64 iElements )
00297     {
00298         if( m_MemorySize > iElements )
00299             return true;
00300 
00301         T* pTemp = new T[ ( size_t )( iElements * 2 + 256 ) ];
00302         if( !pTemp )
00303             return false;
00304 
00305         if( m_NumElements )
00306         {
00307             CopyMemory( pTemp, m_pData, ( size_t )( m_NumElements * sizeof( T ) ) );
00308         }
00309 
00310         if( m_pData ) delete []m_pData;
00311         m_pData = pTemp;
00312         return true;
00313     }
00314 
00315 public:
00316             CDXUTStack()
00317             {
00318                 m_pData = NULL; m_NumElements = 0; m_MemorySize = 0;
00319             }
00320             ~CDXUTStack()
00321             {
00322                 if( m_pData ) delete []m_pData;
00323             }
00324 
00325     UINT    GetCount()
00326     {
00327         return m_NumElements;
00328     }
00329     T       GetAt( UINT i )
00330     {
00331         return m_pData[i];
00332     }
00333     T       GetTop()
00334     {
00335         if( m_NumElements < 1 )
00336             return NULL;
00337 
00338         return m_pData[ m_NumElements - 1 ];
00339     }
00340 
00341     T       GetRelative( INT i )
00342     {
00343         INT64 iVal = m_NumElements - 1 + i;
00344         if( iVal < 0 )
00345             return NULL;
00346         return m_pData[ iVal ];
00347     }
00348 
00349     bool    Push( T pElem )
00350     {
00351         if( !EnsureStackSize( m_NumElements + 1 ) )
00352             return false;
00353 
00354         m_pData[m_NumElements] = pElem;
00355         m_NumElements++;
00356 
00357         return true;
00358     }
00359 
00360     T       Pop()
00361     {
00362         if( m_NumElements < 1 )
00363             return NULL;
00364 
00365         m_NumElements --;
00366         return m_pData[m_NumElements];
00367     }
00368 };
